Verse: The messengers carried these letters to all the rulers and to all the important people. The letters commanded [people to kill all the Jews]. Haman wanted [people to kill all the old Jews and all the young Jews]. Haman also wanted [people to kill all the Jewish women and all the Jewish children]. The letters also said [that people may take all of the things [that the Jews owned]]. The people must kill all the Jews on March seven.
